column5: The Capri Inn and Travel-lodge are on Ontario street right at the QEW, walking distance from the Odyssey.  http://www.capriinn.com/  http://www.booking.com/hotel/ca/travelo ... Kgod-BsHDw  The Best Western and Days Inn are one exit to the east of Ontario Street (5 minutes from Odyssey)  http://heartofniagarahotels.com/page/best_western  http://heartofniagarahotels.com/page/days_inn
I booked some rooms for the Scotty KOTL spring tourney last year @ the Travel Lodge. I'd rather sleep in my car. Sorry for the hijack, but someones gotta call this place out  Slayer
Dang I am glad we booked our room last summer good heads up Dax. I know there is also a huge bowling tourney the same day

I'd stay at the Days Inn or the Best Western, the Quality Inn and Suites that the Odyssey is at is now a Holiday Inn. With the Days Inn, there is a Perkins Restaurant (great brekkie)as well as Wrigley's Field Sports Bar (great wings).
